title: 3D Earthquake Data Visualization
description: In this coding challenge, I follow up on the Earthquake Data Visualization challenge and create a 3D version in Processing(Java) using spherical coordinates. I also discuss some 3D vector math including the cross product.

timestamps.title: Mention the previous coding challenge 'Earthquake Data Visualization'
Set up Processing environment with a 3D renderer
Add lights to shade the sphere
Rotate sphere around the y axis
Place a point with a fixed longitude and latitude
Convert longitude and latitude to an x and y location
Loop through the rows of the table
Describe how to draw boxes with a different height
Map the magnitude to the height of the boxes
Describe how to extrude boxes from the sphere
Re-introduce magnitude to size the boxes
Find Earth texture from NASA reference
Add the texture to the sphere
Describe issue with the alignment of the texture
